rounds.category: ADD "S" TO THE START OF THE WORD

clues.text: Non-magical "Harry Potter" folk illegally import an "S" to make this word

To choose by vote; with an "S" in front, you get this related word meaning to choose in preference to another

clues.response: memory chips (static random access memory chips)

True segmented worms include earth-worms & these, formerly used for medicinal purposes
Form of corporal punishment the old lady in the shoe gave to her many children
